body: I was trying to record my laggy nexus experience.....then this happened:
body_tagged: I was trying to record my laggy nexus experience.....then this happened:
title: Getting spawnkilled with a laggy computer.

replies.body:
And why do we care....?

Post a topic in player reports if you want something to happen. The "regulars" can't do crap about spawnkilling.
replies.body_tagged:
And why do we care....?

Post a topic in player reports if you want something to happen. The "regulars" can't do crap about spawnkilling.

replies.body: Calm down, I'm trying to convince people to make a fix for it, don't be such a douche.
replies.body_tagged: Calm down, I'm trying to convince people to make a fix for it, don't be such a douche.

replies.body:
Easy fix: leave the game.

All you're saying in this topic is that you got spawnkilled on a laggy computer, nothing about wanting a fix. Make it clear next time.

eg; create a system and suggest it here like you can't get hit for 5 seconds after spawning
